entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:37 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:37 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
